about_the_game:
Collection Quest is a simple story/lore-driven collectathon.
With an emphasis on Free Roam Exploration.
It was Inspired by Retro + Flash games.

Prepare for an Old-School adventure with modern twist!
Engage with its denizens and leave no stone unturned.

Complete quest, solve puzzles and get lost in a strange new world!

Remember to Interact with Everything!

Adventure Awaits!

Features:


  • Casual-friendly accessible gameplay with puzzles and story elements that still respect the player
  • Engaging and intractable world populated with unique characters
  • Varied quest and ways to collect all the games relics
  • Overarching story/lore-driven experience
  • Filled to the brim with secrets to discover
  • 100 Achievements to Collect!
  • Rich VO dialog
  • Controller support
  • Local and Remote-Play Split-Screen CO-OP
  • Retro style graphics with a flavorful bit of modern touches, hmm, Delicious
  • Attention to detail around every corner 🎱

highlighted.name: Just As You Said You Would

name: Collection Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 900+ / RX 400+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060+ / RX 580+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“... If your looking for a game where you can mow down enemies left, right and centre, this is not the game for you. this game is more like a story driven scavenger hunt.”
👍 – Riplea

“This game has more secrets than actual game... experimenting with the pointless things, you'll find the real Collection Quest. If you enjoy the late 80s and early 90s style of cryptic secrets in games, or secret content that sounds like weird internet rumors, you'll enjoy this game a lot.”
👍 – GauRocks

“Great anxiety relief collect-a-thon that makes the player engage with the squishy gray mass... Winter Solstice.”
👍 – Singularity
short_description: For the people who like reading quest descriptions and following context clues. Also a great experience for Achievement Hunters with 100 to collect. All while a subtle interconnected story unfolds. Free Roam Exploration awaits in a strange new world!
